triples.name: Large language model
triples.relevance: MetaGPT builds upon large language models as the core foundation for its multi-agent framework.

triples.name: Multi-agent system
triples.relevance: MetaGPT proposes a novel framework for organizing multiple agents in collaborative problem-solving.

triples.name: Prompt engineering
triples.relevance: MetaGPT encodes workflows into prompt sequences to guide agents through standardized procedures.

triples.name: Software engineering
triples.relevance: MetaGPT is evaluated on collaborative software engineering benchmarks to validate its effectiveness.

triples.name: Dialogue system
triples.relevance: MetaGPT addresses limitations in dialogue-based task solving by introducing structured workflows.

triples.name: Hallucination (artificial intelligence)
triples.relevance: MetaGPT targets cascading hallucinations as a key problem to solve in multi-agent LLM systems.

triples.name: Metaprogramming
triples.relevance: MetaGPT employs meta-programming techniques to encode human workflows and procedures into agent instructions.

triples.name: Problem solving
triples.relevance: MetaGPT enables automated problem solving through organized multi-agent collaboration.
